publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4198 Christine Grahame: Palestinian Children’s Images Exhibition - Life Under Occupation—That the Parliament sends its greetings to the children of Palestine; recognises the difficult circumstances in which they are growing up, as illustrated in the pictures displayed in the Parliament’s Garden Lobby with images of terror and hardship and of a lost childhood; thanks the children for the paintings they have made which portray in simple but disturbing images the life of children under occupation, and conveys its heartfelt wishes for a peaceful future for them soon.

S2M-4198 Palestinian Children’s Images Exhibition - Life Under Occupation (lodged on 28 March 2006) Mark Ballard*, Chris Ballance*, Jim Mather*, Linda Fabiani*, Rob Gibson*, Alex Neil*, Michael McMahon*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Adam Ingram*

S2M-4198 Christine Grahame: Palestinian Children’s Images Exhibition - Life Under Occupation—That the Parliament sends its greetings to the children of Palestine; recognises the difficult circumstances in which they are growing up, as illustrated in the pictures displayed in the Parliament’s Garden Lobby with images of terror and hardship and of a lost childhood; thanks the children for the paintings they have made which portray in simple but disturbing images the life of children under occupation, and conveys its heartfelt wishes for a peaceful future for them soon. Supported by: Mark Ballard, Chris Ballance, Jim Mather, Linda Fabiani, Rob Gibson, Alex Neil, Michael McMahon, Ms Sandra White, Mr Adam Ingram, Brian Adam, Bruce Crawford, Jackie Baillie, Trish Godman, Robin Harper, Patrick Harvie, Fiona Hyslop, Mike Pringle, Eleanor Scott, Mr Frank McAveety, Donald Gorrie, Tommy Sheridan, Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, Alasdair Morgan*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Dr Jean Turner*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Dennis Canavan*, Karen Gillon*, Karen Whitefield*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Shona Robison*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr John Swinney*, Shiona Baird*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Bill Butler*, Marlyn Glen*, Maureen Macmillan*, Susan Deacon*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-4198 Palestinian Children’s Images Exhibition - Life Under Occupation (lodged on 28 March 2006) Pauline McNeill*
